results.title: Metformin: A Potential Therapeutic Tool for Rheumatologists
results.text_hl: Several studies demonstrated @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s beneficial effects on both animal and @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Rheumatic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012216 @@@rheumatologic diseases@@@, especially on @DISEASE_Arthritis_Rheumatoid @DISEASE_MESH:D001172 @@@rheumatoid arthritis@@@.

citations.NLM: Salvatore T, Pafundi PC, Galiero R, Gjeloshi K, Masini F, Acierno C, Di Martino A, Albanese G, Alfano M, Rinaldi L, Sasso FC. Metformin: A Potential Therapeutic Tool for Rheumatologists Pharmaceuticals (Basel). 2020 Sep 4;13(9):. PMID: 32899806

results.title: Immunomodulatory Effects of SGLT2 Inhibitors and Metformin in Managing Rheumatic Diseases: A Narrative Review.
results.text_hl: Immunomodulatory Effects of SGLT2 Inhibitors and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ in Managing @<m>DISEASE_Rheumatic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012216 @@@Rheumatic Diseases@@@: A Narrative Review.

results.title: Metformin Treatment Reduces the Incidence of Rheumatoid Arthritis: A Two-Sample Mendelian Randomized Study
results.text_hl: Several studies have shown that @<m>DISEASE_Rheumatic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D012216 @@@rheumatologic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ can benefit from @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, but it remains unclear whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment is causally associated with the risk of @DISEASE_Arthritis_Rheumatoid @DISEASE_MESH:D001172 @@@rheumatoid arthritis@@@ (@DISEASE_Arthritis_Rheumatoid @DISEASE_MESH:D001172 @@@RA@@@).

citations.NLM: Liang J, Cai Y, Zhang J, Jing Z, Lv L, Zhang G, Zhang R, Liu R, Nan K, Dang X. Metformin Treatment Reduces the Incidence of Rheumatoid Arthritis: A Two-Sample Mendelian Randomized Study J Clin Med. 2023 Mar 23;12(7):. PMID: 37048545
